project.name: Teko
project.description: A money market with leveraged strategies + margin trading
project.longDescription: Teko Finance is a cutting-edge money market protocol built on MegaETH, offering a comprehensive suite of lending, borrowing, and leveraged trading features. Our platform combines traditional lending markets with innovative leveraged strategies, providing users with enhanced yield opportunities and flexible borrowing options.

features.title: Lending Markets
features.description: Earn yield by providing liquidity to various lending pools with different risk profiles.

features.title: Flexible Borrowing
features.description: Borrow against your collateral with customizable loan-to-value ratios and risk parameters.

features.title: Leveraged Strategies
features.description: Access advanced trading strategies with built-in leverage for enhanced returns.

features.title: Risk Management
features.description: Comprehensive risk assessment tools and transparent pool metrics for informed decision-making.

features.title: Margin Trading
features.description: Trade with leverage while maintaining full control over your positions and risk exposure.

project.currentStatus: The testnet is live with core lending and borrowing functionality. Users can mint test tokens, provide liquidity, and experiment with borrowing features. Leveraged strategies and margin trading coming soon.

steps.title: Access the Testnet Faucet
steps.content: Visit the Teko Finance testnet platform to mint test tokens for experimenting with the protocol's features.

steps.title: Select Collateral and Borrow Amount
steps.content:
1. Navigate to the borrowing interface
2. Choose your preferred collateral asset
3. Specify how much you want to borrow
4. Review the loan-to-value ratio and risk parameters
5. Confirm your borrowing position

steps.title: Provide Liquidity
steps.content:
1. Browse available lending pools
2. Review pool statistics and risk profiles
3. Choose the amount you want to deposit
4. Expand pool details for more information about APY and risk metrics
5. Confirm your deposit to start earning yield
